code: import React,{useState}from"react";import ToggleSwitch from"./components/ToggleSwitch";import DateDropdown from"./components/DateDropdown";import StrategyCards from"./components/StrategyCards";import{dateArray}from"./data";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[selectedView,setSelectedView]=useState("Bullish");const[selectedDate,setSelectedDate]=useState(dateArray[0]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Trading Strategy Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToggleSwitch,{selectedView:selectedView,setSelectedView:setSelectedView}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DateDropdown,{selectedDate:selectedDate,setSelectedDate:setSelectedDate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StrategyCards,{selectedView:selectedView,selectedDate:selectedDate})]});};export default App;
